Looking for a tester for your latest homebrew? Someone to take all the lethal-weapon sized Zucchini's from your garden? A pal to keep you company on your next adventure? That could be me! Let's talk!

At this time I am not taking on new projects, but if you get in touch I'd be happy to offer some recommendations of other freelancers.
